_comment: Claude Desktop MCP Configuration for Google Drive & Gmail
_instructions: 1. Copy this file to your Claude Desktop config location:
2. Replace the placeholder values below with your actual credentials:
- GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID: From Google Cloud Console OAuth2 credentials
- GOOGLE_CLIENT_SECRET: From Google Cloud Console OAuth2 credentials
- GOOGLE_REFRESH_TOKEN: Generated using the OAuth2 flow
- GOOGLE_PRIVATE_KEY: From service account JSON file (escape newlines as \n)
3. Remove this _comment and _instructions section before using
4. Restart Claude Desktop after making changes

env._comment_oauth: OAuth2 credentials for Gmail access (personal accounts)
env._comment_service_account: Service Account credentials for Google Drive access
